synopsis.text: Hibernating bear-man Nowa's solitary life in the forest takes a turn when he discovers and adopts a humanized puppy named Airi. As winter approaches, Nowa goes into hibernation, leaving Airi, still a pup, behind. Upon waking up in spring, Nowa is greeted by a grown-up Airi, eagerly expressing his affection towards Nowa. The story unfolds as the two navigate their unique bond, blossoming into an unconventional love between a bear and a dog.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
